content.question: The text in the passage likely inspired Congress to act based on which of the following clauses of the United States Constitution?

choices.label: The free exercise clause of the First Amendment
The commerce clause in Article I, Section 8
The reserved powers clause of the Tenth Amendment
The equal protection clause of the Fourteenth Amendment

content.answer: The equal protection clause of the Fourteenth Amendment

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain how the implications of the argument or perspective in the source may affect political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
